reviews.content: Everything is working except the shutdown menu that appears when you turn your phone off
working on my ip8 best tweak by far :)

It’s working without any problem on iPad Pro 10.5” OS 13.5 unc0ver. But beware of the unresponsive developer. For a more smooth experience, I can recommend Litten and her free tweak called “Puck” that basically does the same thing as SafeShutdown/Sentinel
Great tweak, will cause unnecessary reboots
Algunas funciones no están al 100% en iPhone 11 Pro Max iOS 13.5

Little slow on the respring compared to newer tweaks. But it works and has saved my jailbreak more than once when my battery is low or I leave a jailbroken device somewhere . IPhone XS MAX 12.4 Arm64e Unc0ver 3.8.0 b1
Awesome tweak! It's "saved" (in quotes because it's not a big deal rejailbreaking) my jailbreak multiple times and also reminds me to charge my phone a lot.

Works great ! 
(Reviewed by @iTollMouS XS Max owner)
